title: The Party Starter
description: The classic deck for house parties. Good vibes, bad decisions, and hilarious memories.

cards.content: Truth: What is the drunkest thing you have ever done?
cards.back: Dare: Down your drink (or take a shot).

cards.content: Truth: Who in this room do you think has the worst taste in music?
cards.back: Dare: Let the group pick a song and you must lip-sync to it perfectly.

cards.content: Truth: Have you ever thrown up on someone?
cards.back: Dare: Spin around 10 times and try to walk in a straight line.

cards.content: Truth: What is the most embarrassing photo on your phone right now?
cards.back: Dare: Post a humiliating photo of yourself on your Story (delete after 24h).

cards.content: Truth: Who in this room would you least like to be stuck in an elevator with?
cards.back: Dare: Sit on the lap of the person to your right for the next round.

cards.content: Truth: Have you ever ghosted someone you were dating?
cards.back: Dare: Hand your phone to the group and let them send one emoji to a random contact.

cards.content: Truth: What is your biggest regret from a night out?
cards.back: Dare: Mix three different drinks together and take a sip.

cards.content: Truth: Have you ever hooked up with a friend's ex?
cards.back: Dare: Give a foot massage to the person on your left.

cards.content: Truth: What is the meanest rumor you’ve heard about yourself?
cards.back: Dare: Yell the first word that comes to your mind right now.

cards.content: Truth: Who in this room is the biggest flirt?
cards.back: Dare: Wink at every person in the room individually.

cards.content: Truth: Have you ever been arrested or detained by police?
cards.back: Dare: Do your best impression of a police siren loud enough for neighbors to hear.

cards.content: Truth: What’s the worst pickup line you’ve ever used?
cards.back: Dare: Use a cheesy pickup line on the person across from you.

cards.content: Truth: Have you ever skinny-dipped?
cards.back: Dare: Take off your socks using only your teeth.

cards.content: Truth: If you had to date someone in this room, who would it be?
cards.back: Dare: Let the person to your right sit on your back while you do 5 pushups.

cards.content: Truth: What is the most illegal thing you have ever done?
cards.back: Dare: Call a pizza place and ask if they sell tacos.

cards.content: Truth: Who do you think is the worst driver in this group?
cards.back: Dare: Blindfold yourself and let someone guide you around the room.

cards.content: Truth: Have you ever faked an orgasm?
cards.back: Dare: Eat a snack without using your hands.

cards.content: Truth: What is the most embarrassing thing your parents have caught you doing?
cards.back: Dare: Call your mom/dad and tell them you love them, then hang up immediately.

cards.content: Truth: Who in this room spends the most time on the toilet?
cards.back: Dare: Go to the bathroom and take a selfie in the mirror.

cards.content: Truth: Have you ever stolen something?
cards.back: Dare: Try to pickpocket the person to your left (with permission).

cards.content: Truth: What is your biggest insecurity?
cards.back: Dare: Stand on a chair and announce 'I am the King/Queen of the World!'

cards.content: Truth: Have you ever peed your pants as an adult?
cards.back: Dare: Put an ice cube down your shirt.

cards.content: Truth: Who is the funniest person in this room?
cards.back: Dare: Try to make the group laugh without speaking.

cards.content: Truth: Have you ever stalked someone in real life?
cards.back: Dare: Exchange shirts with the person to your right.

cards.content: Truth: What is the wildest place you’ve hooked up?
cards.back: Dare: Demonstrate your favorite dance move.

cards.content: Truth: Who in this room has the best style?
cards.back: Dare: Let someone restyle your hair with water.

cards.content: Truth: Have you ever lied on your resume?
cards.back: Dare: Sell the object nearest to you like a telemarketer.

cards.content: Truth: What is the longest you’ve gone without brushing your teeth?
cards.back: Dare: Smile with your teeth showing for the entire next round.

cards.content: Truth: If you could fire one person from your life, who would it be?
cards.back: Dare: Pretend to fire the person to your left like a ruthless boss.

cards.content: Truth: Have you ever kissed more than one person in one night?
cards.back: Dare: Kiss the cheek of the person to your left.

cards.content: Truth: What is the most shallow reason you broke up with someone?
cards.back: Dare: Show the group your ID/Driver's License photo.

cards.content: Truth: Who in this room is most likely to get arrested?
cards.back: Dare: Put your hands behind your back and pretend to be arrested.

cards.content: Truth: Have you ever sent a dirty pic to the wrong person?
cards.back: Dare: Draw a mustache on your face with a pen (washable!).

cards.content: Truth: What is a secret you’ve never told your parents?
cards.back: Dare: Whisper a secret to the person on your right.

cards.content: Truth: Have you ever had a crush on a teacher/professor?
cards.back: Dare: Act like a strict teacher scolding the group.

cards.content: Truth: Who in this room do you think is rich?
cards.back: Dare: Ask someone for a dollar in the most pathetic way possible.

cards.content: Truth: Have you ever been caught lying to a friend?
cards.back: Dare: Tell the person to your left something you honestly admire about them.

cards.content: Truth: What is the most cringeworthy thing you’ve posted online?
cards.back: Dare: Read the last text message you received out loud.

cards.content: Truth: Have you ever broken a bone doing something stupid?
cards.back: Dare: Wrap your head in toilet paper like a bandage.

cards.content: Truth: Who in this room intimidates you the most?
cards.back: Dare: Stare contest with the person you find most intimidating.

cards.content: Truth: Have you ever blamed a fart on someone else?
cards.back: Dare: Smell the armpit of the person next to you.

cards.content: Truth: What is the worst gift you have ever given someone?
cards.back: Dare: Gift someone in the room a piece of trash solemnly.

cards.content: Truth: Have you ever dined and dashed?
cards.back: Dare: Run in place for 1 minute while shouting 'I'm fast as boy!'

cards.content: Truth: Who in this room would you trust with your life?
cards.back: Dare: Let that person feed you a snack.

cards.content: Truth: What is your guilty pleasure TV show?
cards.back: Dare: Act out a dramatic scene from a soap opera.

cards.content: Truth: Have you ever looked through a partner's phone?
cards.back: Dare: Unlock your phone and place it in the center of the table for 1 minute.

cards.content: Truth: What is the weirdest place you have fallen asleep?
cards.back: Dare: Lie on the floor and pretend to be asleep for one round.

cards.content: Truth: Have you ever lied about your age?
cards.back: Dare: Act like an old person complaining about 'kids these days'.

cards.content: Truth: Who is the most dramatic person in this room?
cards.back: Dare: Fake a dramatic faint.

cards.content: Truth: Have you ever blocked a friend on social media?
cards.back: Dare: Go to your blocked list and read the first name (if any).

cards.content: Truth: What is the most money you’ve lost or wasted?
cards.back: Dare: Throw a coin across the room and then crawl to find it.

cards.content: Truth: Have you ever had a crush on a friend's sibling?
cards.back: Dare: Admit which friend has the hottest family.

cards.content: Truth: What is a habit of yours that is disgusting?
cards.back: Dare: Pick your nose and flick it (fake it, please).

cards.content: Truth: Have you ever worn the same underwear two days in a row?
cards.back: Dare: Check the label of your shirt and read it out loud.

cards.content: Truth: Who do you text the most?
cards.back: Dare: Dictate a text to that person chosen by the group.

cards.content: Truth: Have you ever been rejected publicly?
cards.back: Dare: Propose marriage to a lamp or piece of furniture.

cards.content: Truth: What is the worst meal you’ve ever cooked?
cards.back: Dare: Eat a teaspoon of hot sauce (or lemon juice).

cards.content: Truth: Have you ever fallen in love at first sight?
cards.back: Dare: Make intense eye contact with the person across from you for 30 seconds.

cards.content: Truth: What is the pettiest thing you’ve ever done?
cards.back: Dare: Slowly knock a cup off the table like a cat.

cards.content: Truth: Who in this room has the most annoying laugh?
cards.back: Dare: Imitate that person's laugh.
